keyMoments.title: CP9 Leaves Paulie and Iceburg to Die
keyMoments.description: After confirming Iceburg doesn't have the Pluton blueprints, CP9 ties up Paulie and Iceburg and leaves them in the burning building to die.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates CP9's ruthlessness and the World Government's willingness to eliminate anyone in their way.

keyMoments.title: CP9 Targets Franky for Pluton Blueprints
keyMoments.description: Rob Lucci announces that their next target is Franky (Cutty Flam), Tom's second disciple, to obtain the Pluton blueprints.
keyMoments.significance: Shifts the focus of CP9's mission and establishes Franky as a key figure in the ancient weapon storyline.

bases.description: CP9's primary base of operations, a judicial island of the World Government.

description: Cipher Pol Number 9 is a secret World Government intelligence and assassination agency. Unlike other Cipher Pol units, CP9 is given complete license to kill in the name of 'Dark Justice.' They operate in the shadows, conducting covert operations and eliminating threats to the World Government. CP9 agents are masters of Rokushiki, a special superhuman martial arts style, and several members possess Devil Fruit abilities.
